response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, representing years of dedication and innovation. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, considering your potential to make the most out of its capabilities.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. I am open to discussing any concerns or questions you might have, and I am confident that we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
